image.title: Image keyword
image.description: Keyword for the image of the item. Applications must handle changes in these keywords.

url.title: External URL
url.description: Defines the URL of the item. Applications should redirect the user to this URL.

html.title: Internal HTML
html.description: The name of the internal HTML document. Applications should redirect to these files. These files are available at `https://hydra.ugent.be/api/2.0/info/{name}`.

subcontent.title: Subcontent
subcontent.descriptions: Contains the child items of this item. Applications should display the list of children.
